title: Eileen West Long Sleeve Sweater Knit Gown

description: This cozy Eileen West Long Sleeve Sweater Knit Gown is designed for cold days. The lace-trimmed neckline and the latticework floral lace on the front yoke add a feminine touch to this special piece. It has ruffles on the angled cuffs, an akoya shell button placket and a ruffled hemline. 95% polyester, 5% spandex. Machine wash, tumble dry,
